title: Project: Generative AI Applications with RAG and LangChain
about: Capstone project focused on building generative AI applications using RAG and LangChain.

topics.name: Project Design
topics.details: Defining objectives and requirements for a generative AI application.

topics.name: Implementation
topics.details: Building and integrating RAG and LangChain components.

topics.name: Evaluation
topics.details: Testing and evaluating the final application.

summary: This capstone module brings together all previous concepts in a practical generative AI project using RAG and LangChain.
